subject: Have a description of a test
msgSnippet: Hi everybody !! Is there a way to put a description on a TestCase like @Test(description= improve speed tests ) ... Class        |    description  | status |
messageBody:
Hi everybody !!

Is there a way to put a description on a TestCase like

@Test(description="improve speed tests")

and after when a junitreport is generated have something like in the html report :

--------------------------------------------------------
Class | description | status | failure | type
--------------------------------------------------------

Thanks, DL
